name: Do You Wanna Warm a Snowman?
name_original: Do You Wanna Warm a Snowman?
description:
Help dryer defeat evil snowmen who want to freeze the whole world.

Game made by Xenk && M4sterek for mini-jam-124.

Controlls Player RotationMoving Mouse Shooting
Left Mouse Button
Moving
WASD / Arrows
How to play

Use your heat to melt the snowmen. When you run out of energy, find a charging pad and stay on it to recharge your energy (when you're on the pad you can't shoot). In the game you have a stat store where you can increase your stats for your score.
